::Slayer::

Multiple shots slam into the damaged side of Slayer's armor, sending 
him flying out of the way of the other shots that were aimed at him. 
He could feel the burning of the melted suit against his skin. Slayer 
sees two shadows above him, knowing they were more bots.

Activating his jetpack, Slayer erupts from the water. His scanners 
reported that Prebon was already in the Predacon base. It was too 
late. Slayer growled, baring his teeth.

"Let's get out of here. Its too late. Meet me at base and we'll plan 
these bots' demise," he says over the comm to Ignatis as he blasts off 
toward the Trainer base. He would take a different route so that the 
Predacons couldn't follow as easilly, and he would stop at several 
locations in case they did follow. Those bots would pay for taking his 
master, they would pay dearly...
